alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 8:11AM AKDT until October 28 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches above 1500 ft on the Klondike Highway. * WHERE...Klondike Highway above 1500 feet including White Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Visibility may be significantly reduced during periods of heavier snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of moderate to occasionally heavy snow showers will continue through the late afternoon hours. Snow showers will taper off by early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
